kpi.name: M5000C431

kpi_info.title: TTI SCHEDULED DC HSDPA MIMO USER WITH BOTH CARRIER DUAL STREAM
kpi_info.use: Scheduled DC-HSDPA + MIMO users when both carriers are used and MIMO Dual Stream is used in both primary and secondary cells. When this counter is updated the counters M5000C333, M5000C334 and M5000C336 are updated also. UPDATED: The counter is updated by 1 if TTI was scheduled to DC+MIMO user on both carriers and Dual Stream is used in both cells.

kpi.kpi_alias: TTI SCHEDULED DC HSDPA MIMO USER WITH BOTH CARRIER DUAL STREAM
